### Authors

This project was completed in December 2019 for P8105: Data Science, by Lisa Eisler MD, Jerri Chen MD PhD, Katherine Dimitripoulou PhD

### Data Source

This project utilizes data requested from the American College of Surgeons National Surgical Quality Improvement Program Pediatric Database [ACS NSQIP-P](https://www.facs.org/quality-programs/childrens-surgery/pediatric/program-specifics/quality-support-tools/puf).
